TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecurityMasks extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the available options for examining security information of a directory object. This enumeration is used with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.SecurityMasks%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntryConfiguration.SecurityMasks%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.SecurityMasks Dacl = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Reads or writes the discretionary access-control list (DACL) data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.SecurityMasks Group = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Reads or writes the group data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.SecurityMasks None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Does not read or write security data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.SecurityMasks Owner = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Reads or writes the owner data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.SecurityMasks Sacl = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Reads or writes the system access-control list (SACL) data.
